● Summary

  I've completed comprehensive testing of the Tmux Orchestrator monitoring system improvements:

  Created Test Suites:
  1. test_monitor_crash_detection.py - Tests @ symbol fix and auto-submit improvements
  2. test_monitor_pm_notifications.py - Tests PM notification delivery and cooldowns
  3. test_monitor_auto_recovery.py - Tests automatic agent recovery mechanisms

  Results:
  - ✅ 37 tests created and passing
  - ✅ @ symbol false positive fix validated
  - ✅ Auto-submit using Enter key confirmed
  - ✅ PM notifications working with proper cooldowns
  - ✅ Auto-recovery mechanisms robust

  Documentation:
  - Technical test report: /workspaces/Tmux-Orchestrator/tests/MONITORING_TEST_RESULTS.md
  - PM report: /workspaces/Tmux-Orchestrator/QA_REPORT_FOR_PM.md

  The monitoring system improvements are production-ready!

> /exit
